td.content: s:pt presents with moderate weak urinary stream, severe fatigue, Diabetes. patient also reports of moderate urinary hesitancy. she is a 61 year old female consultant. Patient reports that she never drinks alcohol pt reports that she smokes once or twice daily o:Height 65 in, Weight 113 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 19, HbA1c HbA1c=9 %, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, age-appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a:Type 2 Diabetes p:administered glimepiride - 4 mg daily, performed HbA1c, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Term.SYMPTOM: Delay when starting to pass urine
